trans-unit.source: Defines constants that represent areas in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo> class.
A position above the client portion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
A position below the client portion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
A position within the bounds of an image contained in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
A position within the bounds of a text area contained in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
A position to the left of the client portion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
A position outside the bounds of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>
A position to the right of the client portion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
A position within the bounds of an image associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that indicates the state of the item.
